quest.name: Not for Drinking
journal:
Regitt is looking for someone reliable to run a little errand.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Pay the pouch of grog money to the sundries supplier in Sullen.
Deliver the sealed ale cask to Regitt.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Ozogg's ethanol will keep our tanks rolling well enough for the time being, but even she agrees that the future holds room for improvement. We reckon the answer might lie in the techniques used for brewing grog, which we can adapt to create new types of fuel.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: To that end, we've decided to research as many regional brews as we can get our hands on. Any one of these fermented delights could hold the key to producing an alternative that's safe, cheap, and easy to make.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: ...You're likely wondering what your role is in all this. Well, it's a simple one this time: I give you the coin, and you buy the grog.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: I know, I know, you're more than just an errand girlboy, but believe me─you're the only one I can trust with this job. Anyway, off to Sullen with you. Should be a bloke there waiting with our order.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT03926
dialogue.text: ...The cask for Master Regitt? Yes, yes, I have it ready right here. If I might trouble you for the payment...?

dialogue.name: MERCHANT03926
dialogue.text: Thank you, misssir, and remember: lift with your legs, not with your back. I bid you good day.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Back with that cask already? No, uh, “trouble” on the road, then?

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: ...It's still sealed! I mean, of course it is! I knew I could count on you!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: If I'd sent a Tholl to buy that grog, you could bet your grandmother's boots he'd have to stop somewhere and “sample the merchandise.” That's why I had to ask you instead.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Speaking of sampling, I should probably take a little sip myself. You know, just to make sure it's─ No! This is for research! Ahem, you can go now, Forename!
